synopsis: 2620 AD. Humanity tried a terraforming project on Mars, which lead to super evolved roaches, as well as the Alien Engine virus, which has a 100% death rate. To break through this nightmare, a crew that had undergone a special surgery has been sent to Mars. Hizamaru Akari and Michelle K. Davis lead crew members with special powers to try to resolve both of these issues.

title.jp: Century of Raising Arms: Ikari no Kanchou

synopsis: No. 4 Division gets to the main ship, but finds they've walked into a trap. The Chinese division has betrayed them, and wants the two post-surgery humans as experimental samples. The Chinese have brought weapons, which they use to slaughter the Terraformars by the hundreds.

The No. 1 and No. 2 divisions have walked into a trap set by the Chinese team. They manage to neutralize the Chinese' superior weaponry, but they still have a few tricks up their sleeve, and their transforming power is greater than it may appear!
The battle between humans is interrupted by a horde of thousands of angry aliens. Will the crew of Annex 1 be able to work together long enough to survive the onslaught of a new Terraformar general?

title.jp: Man on a Mission: Heishi to Chichioya

synopsis: The Chinese division has revealed their ultimate weapon: a girl with an anthrax surgery base. Unless she's killed, there is no hope of defeating them and reclaiming Annex 1. Alexander goes in alone into the anthrax-covered spaceship to assassinate her.

title.jp: Strategy and Tactics: Buki to Jutsu

synopsis: Separated from the group, Michelle and Hizamaru are attacked by Terraformars using the powers of the other Mosaic operation subjects who died. Overwhelmed and outmatched, their only hope is to use a cunning plan to trick No. 4 division into destroying their foes for them.

Michelle and Hizamaru use their unique weapons to defeat the Terraformars who possess the powers of the former crew. Will their Ninja-vibro-blades and acceleration-boosted martial arts be enough to stand up against the superpowered Terraformars?

title.jp: Web of Bend: Ryoushi no Ami

synopsis: Michelle and Akari are kidnapped by Bao from No. 4 division. He tries to take them back to Annex 1, but to get there, he'll have to break through a horde of thousands of Terraformars. He decides to sacrifice Yaeko to get away. Will her non-combatant rank powers be enough to hold off the swarm?

The mighty rank 1, Joseph G. Newton, arrives to save Yaeko from the horde! He easily dispatches Bao and rescues Akari and Michelle. But will he be able to achieve his greatest objective... and win Michelle's heart?

The engineering team, led by a few lower-ranking combat soldiers, mounts a desperate assault on the bioweapon-infested Annex 1. The Terraformars attack at the same time, making for a disastrous 3-way battle.

title.jp: Silence or Violence: Fugen no Ken

synopsis: The engineering team continues its strike on Annex 1, but the Terraformars have infiltrated the ship as well. With foes on all sides, both human and inhuman, will they be able to make their way to the control room and alert Earth to No. 4 Division's treachery?

title.jp: Strength of Weakest: Motazaru Mono no Tamashii

synopsis: The battle for the broadcast tower rages on as the civilian crew of No. 1 division infiltrates the control room. But the Terraformars are there two! If they make any noise the trained killers of No. 4 Division will hear them, so they're forced to continue their work in total silence as the killer cockroaches get every closer...
